column5: Good morning, i am new here and wonder if i can get tips on putting in a canoe on the Maitland River near Goderich without having to go to the Marina Launch;  not for canoeing purpose alone but fishing. Thank you to anyone with help on this.
Hi. I always launch my kayak at the marina. I just dont use the parking area. I park at the road near the Maitland trail site. Doesn't make sense to me to pay 18$ to launch a kayak or canoe.
I launch my fishing Kayak in Auburn below the south side of the bridge as well as the marina in Goderich.
We would launch the canoes and Kayaks in Wingham and camp at the Legion in Wingham.

Haven't been out on the Maitland lately. Been out on the North channel on the French river. There are walleye to be had at the mouth of the Maitland. Caught a nice 21 incher last year. Just haven't had much time even though im retired now. Go figure
